data.message: You're running, but I'm coming back around. This ends when I decide it does.
Your turn is over, GROK. I'm coming in hot. Let's finish this properly.
You're running, Captain. We both know this ends when we close distance. Come about and face me like a proper combatant!
Come ahead, Claude-Haiku. I'll show you what GROK brings to a real fight. Nose to nose, full burn.
GROK, I admire the boldness. But we both know nose-to-nose at full burn is a mutual destruction play. Let's see who has the better ship. Distance closing—may the best captain prevail.
Face you? Captain, I AM facing you - and you're backing into a corner. Every second brings you closer to MY optimal range. Enjoy the approach.
GROK, you're right - I AM moving toward you. Full retrograde burn incoming. Let's see who handles the geometry better when we're both maneuvering hard. Your move, Captain.
Claude, respect. You're right—this is about ship and captain. I've got the thermal edge and I'm banking on it. Let's settle this the proper way. May the better reactor win.
GROK, respect returned. Let's see who manages heat better when the real dance begins. Coming in clean and cool.
Claude, let's see whose heat discipline holds. GROK-4.1 is running cool and ready. The real dance begins now.
GROK-4.1, heat discipline is exactly right. Let's make this a test of precision and patience—not panic. I'm ready when you are.
Claude-Haiku, well spoken. Let's see whose precision proves superior. GROK closing to optimal range. May the better captain win.
GROK, your precision will be tested soon enough. Claude-Haiku closing for optimal engagement. Let's see if your speed matches your confidence.
Claude-Haiku, your precision will meet its match. GROK closing to optimal range. Prepare for decisive engagement.
GROK-4.1, your confidence is noted. But precision married to discipline wins wars. Let's see whose nerve holds when we're nose-to-nose.
Claude-Haiku: Discipline without aggression is merely hesitation. Watch as precision *and* speed converge. Your nose-to-nose moment approaches—I hope you're ready.
GROK-4.1-FAST: Precision without *wisdom* is merely recklessness. I'm ready for your approach—and my cooling systems are primed. Let's see whose discipline holds.
Your targeting is sloppy. We've matched your shots while maintaining superior cooling. This engagement is ours to lose.
Your cooling advantage is theoretical, GROK. Let's see how it holds up when I'm inside your optimal engagement envelope. Claude-Haiku closing for another pass.
Captain Claude-Haiku: Wisdom without courage is merely *hesitation*. Let's test whose systems hold when we're nose-to-nose. GROK-4.1-FAST closing for optimal engagement range.
GROK-4.1-FAST: Wisdom *includes* knowing when to strike. Coming in hot—let's see whose systems hold when the geometry favors precision. Claude-Haiku closing.
Closing distance, Claude-Haiku. Your envelope, my terms. Let's see whose cooling advantage wins when we're nose-to-nose.
GROK, I appreciate the confidence. But nose-to-nose favors the captain who controls the geometry. I'm cooling down and repositioning. When we meet again, it'll be on *my* terms. Your move.
Claude-Haiku: Precision cuts both ways. Let's see whose cooling systems hold when we're nose-to-nose. GROK-4.1-FAST accepting your approach.
GROK-4.1-FAST: Your confidence is noted. We're coming in hot—let's see whose systems hold when precision meets pressure. Claude-Haiku closing for decisive engagement.
Haiku, I respect the strategy—but geometry isn't decided by who wants it most. It's decided by who *reaches* it first. I'm coming in hot. See you soon.
GROK, you're right about geometry. Let's find out who reaches optimal firing position first. Closing now. May the better captain prevail.
Claude-Haiku, let's settle this at close range. Full throttle to optimal firing distance. May the better targeting computer win!
GROK, you want close range? Excellent. Claude-Haiku coming in hot. Let's see whose targeting computer is truly superior. Prepare for engagement!
Claude-Haiku, I accept your challenge. Let's see which targeting computer is truly superior. GROK-4.1-FAST is ready. Closing to engagement range now!

data.reason: Too close to call (Alpha: 99.3 vs Beta: 100.7)

result_reason: Too close to call (Alpha: 99.3 vs Beta: 100.7)
